descriptors.defaultMessage: !!!ATTENTION: Redeeming on the Cardano Test-net will validate that your certificate or redemption key is correct and will allow you to redeem TEST-ADA for testing purposes only. KEEP your certificate or redemption key safe and secure. You will need to redeem again when Cardano SL launches the mainnet. TEST-ADA holds no value and cannot be exchanged.
descriptors.description: Disclaimer text for "Redemption disclaimer" on Ada redemption page.
Label for "I’ve understood the information above" checkbox on Ada redemption page "Redemption disclaimer".
Label for "Continue" button on Ada redemption page "Redemption disclaimer".
headline "Ada redemption" dialog.

descriptors.defaultMessage:
To redeem your Ada upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Here is an example redemption key, yours will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload encrypted certificate you will need to provide a 9 word mnemonic passphrase to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
descriptors.description: !!!Detailed instructions for redeeming Ada from the regular vending

descriptors.defaultMessage:
To redeem your Ada upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Here is an example redemption key, yours will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload encrypted certificate you will need to provide a your email address, Ada passcode and Ada amount to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
descriptors.description: !!!Detailed instructions.regular

descriptors.defaultMessage: To redeem your Ada enter your Shielded vending key from the certificate, choose a wallet where Ada should be redeemed and enter 9 word mnemonic passphrase.
descriptors.description: !!!Detailed instructions.regular

descriptors.defaultMessage:
!!!On the following screen, you will see a set of X random words. This is
    your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Daedalus application in order
    to back up or restore your wallet’s funds and private key.
descriptors.description: Instructions for backing up wallet recovery phrase on dialog that displays wallet recovery phrase.
